reviewText: Perhaps it's a little bit nostalgic, but this was one of the first hunting videos I ever saw when I was beginning to bowhunt.  I loved it.  Was thrilled to find it still available.  Some really interesting techniques.
Older hunting movie but very well done for early 1980's....
very informational if you live at the same lattitude as pennsylvania.

Yes it looks and sounds like an old video.
BUT it isn't edited like a lame infomercial with a million slo mo kill shots with Speed Metal playing in the background.

Just real hunting with real information.
Wish more videos were like this
